sentence.Network_en: Monstrously inflated prices are designed to keep people like us at bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 疯狂飞涨的价格会使像我们这样的人走投无路。

sentence.Network_en: Monstrously inflated costs are designed to keep the hoi polloi at bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 居高不下的生活开支势必会把老百姓逼入走投无路的境地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: monstrously的中文意思:怪物似地...,点击查查权威在线词典详细解释monstrously的中文翻译,monstrously的真人发音,用法和例句等。

list.exp: 把我们从这怪物手里救出来
list.abs: 图文 Save us from this monstrousity!!! 把我们从这怪物手里救出来!!! Ork兽人 The horde has arrived. 部落抵达 The Orks are on the move. 兽人在活动 Orks.

and the novel denouement , with a monstrously eccentric woodsman and some implausible Fundamentalist villains , recalls the Florida black comedies of Carl Hiaasen , only without the laughs .小说结尾中一个怪癖可恶的伐木者和一些不合情理的原教旨主义坏蛋的出场，令人回想起卡尔?海森的佛罗里达黑色幽默剧，只是没带笑声。
...the crowing of cocks and the barking of dogs鸡鸣犬吠monstrously audacious狗胆包天mere trash狗屁不通

entry.tran: 骇人听闻的;极不公正的
entry.def: If you describe a situation or event as monstrous, you mean that it is extremely shocking or unfair.

example.ex: She endured the monstrous behaviour for years...
example.tran: 多年来，她一直忍受着这种骇人听闻的暴行。

example.ex: I just hope the people who committed this monstrous evil will be able to live with themselves.
example.tran: 我只是希望犯下这种骇人罪行的人能承受良心的谴责。

entry.tran: （令人不悦之物）巨大的;特大规模的
entry.def: If you describe an unpleasant thing as monstrous, you mean that it is extremely large in size or extent.

example.tran: 又大又难看的铜制建筑物

example.ex: It was blowing a monstrous gale.

entry.def: If you describe something as monstrous, you mean that it is extremely frightening because it appears unnatural or ugly.

example.tran: 电影里虚构出来的恐怖形象

sentences.sentence: "her face was hideously disfigured after the accident"
"behind the house lay two nude figures grotesquely bald, with deliberate knife-slashes marking their bodies"

auth_sentence.content: The handset is sleek, sexy and monstrously fake.
auth_sentence.res_content: The handset is sleek, sexy and monstrously fake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The handset is sleek, sexy and monstrously fake.

auth_sentence.content: "I would argue the Algerian regime is miscalculating monstrously, " he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I would argue the Algerian regime is miscalculating monstrously, " he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I would argue the Algerian regime is miscalculating monstrously, " he said.

auth_sentence.content: Half poet, half rat of action: that was me, for I was quite monstrously taken up by The Wind in the Willows.
